name: TimeSink (shelerr, ilyamokka)
description:
Once, I found a letter in the mailbox attached to my machine.

It sent a chill down my spine as I read it, because I was sure it could be a message from the future.

Not because I believe in that sort of thing or I was convinced by its contents but because I have been working hard for almost four years to make my time machine work.

This is a short story about preventing a catastrophe.

  • Lie!
  • Sneak!
  • Sabotage!
  • And face the consequences!

WASD to move, LMB (Left Mouse Button) to progress in a dialog.

We used "m6x11" and "Nokia Cellphone FC" fonts.

P. S. The game has no sound due to the bad time management.
